Class QuestionsApiExceptionHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.example.demo.forum.exceptions.QuestionsApiExceptionHandler

  • @ControllerAdvice
public class QuestionsApiExceptionHandler
extends java.lang.Object
    ExceptionHandler to handle all QuestionsApiException thrown by all components.

        @ExceptionHandler(value=java.lang.Exception.class)
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<?> handleAllExceptions(java.lang.Exception ex)
        ControlleAdvice to handle all other unknown exceptions thrown by the api.
        Parameters:

        Returns:
